title: Superfamilies?
content:
What are some of the biggest superfamilies?  
I think [Trivia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.stormtype.com/package-trivia-alliance-pro.html) must hold the record.
author: hashiama

comments.content:
One of the best-known superfamilies is of course Luc(as) de Groot’s <cite>Thesis,</cite> currently including the following members:

– [TheSans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/thesans/) ( [Hair](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/thesans-hair/)/ [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesans/thesans-condensed/))  
– [TheSansMono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesansmono/thesansmono/) ( [SemiCondensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesansmono/thesansmono-semicondensed/)/ [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesansmono/thesansmono-condensed/)/ [Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesansmono/thesans-typewriter/))  
– [TheSansArabic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/thesansarabic/thesansarabic/overview/)  
– [TheMix](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themix/themix/) ( [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themix/themix-condensed/))  
– [TheMixMono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themixmono/themixmono/)  
– [TheMixArabic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/themixarabic/themixarabic/overview/)  
– [TheSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/theserif/theserif/)  
– [TheAntiquaB](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/theantiqua/theantiquab/)/ [TheAntiquaSun](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415050143/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/theantiqua/theantiqua-sun/)

There’s a lot of potential for expansion, obviously. Can’t wait to see the release of TheAntiquaSun Mono SemiCondensed Hair.

Panoptica doesn’t have as many fonts as Trivia, but it equals the number of styles (seven), with a different plan:

Oldstyle (Regular & Italic)  
Egyptian/Slab  
Script  
Octagonal  
Doesburg  
Pixel  
Sans (Regular, Medium and Bold)
